short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This sport extension will help customize your chrome new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sport Sensei is a promising google chrome extension specialized in sports and it will help you customize your chrome new tab experience with a new set of backgrounds to choose from and enjoy.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the "Sports Sensei" tab extension and setting Chrome New Tab search to Bing provided by the service and the Terms of Use at https://sportsensei.info/t-o-s/ and Privacy Policy at https://sportsensei.info/privacy-policy/
